name: Maureen Allanic
title: Professional in AI & Emerging Technology Platforms
summary: Product Owner for end-to-end AI/ML platforms at the European Space Agency, specializing in emerging technologies, MLOps, and GenAI. Passionate about driving innovation through AI training programs and collaborative governance frameworks.

experience.role: Professional in AI & Emerging Technology Platforms
highlights: Serve as Product Owner for an end-to-end AI/ML platform, overseeing capabilities such as data management, preparation, interactive exploration, managed model training, model monitoring, batch inference, and serving
Engage with customers and stakeholders to elicit requirements, constraints, and expectations for the AI & Emerging Technology Platform
Collaborate with teams to define governance policies for AI/ML and emerging technology adoption, ensuring compliance and scalability
Integrated third-party APIs into internal systems, automating workflows and reducing manual processes by 20%
Design and deliver AI training programs for beginners across the agency
Encouraging entrepreneurial spirit at ESA
Building a network of venture-minded ESA professionals
Establishing communication link between Young Professionals and ESA Business Incubation Centres
Provided knowledge management support to space exploration projects (ISS Operations, Orion, I-HAB, ESPRIT, ExoMars, ERO MSR)
Implemented processes for personal data protection, security, and quality management
Designed and delivered training on process best practices and knowledge management tools
Coordinated communications for ESA's Young Professionals Satellite project
Contributed to Ariane 6 maiden flight launch payload proposal
Involved in planning, analysis, development, testing, implementation and rollout of customer projects
Development of customer-specific functionalities
Provided international communication services to luxury brands (Cartier, Longchamp, Rolex, Galeries Lafayette)
Contributed to high-growth startup, supporting cross-functional teams
Monitored implementation of various client IT projects and regional initiatives
Identified business opportunities with IBM Track & Trace blockchain, IBM Cloud, IBM Watson
Provided customized web analytics services to 10+ clients from various sectors
Managed dataLayers implementation, data collection, cleaning, and analysis
Conducted A/B testing and analyzed online marketing strategies

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Management
Master of Science in Economics and Business Administration

education.institution: Aix-Marseille Graduate School of Management - IAE
education.degree: International Master in Management of Information Technology (IMMIT)

education.institution: 中国海洋大学 (Ocean University of China)

projects.name: Smart Green Pallet - IBM
projects.description: Co-creation of a smart green pallet. Incorporating IoT sensors and RFID tags allows for real-time monitoring of the pallet's location, condition, and inventory levels. This ensures better supply chain management and tracking efficiency. PoC developed for CMA CGM.

projects.name: Nota Bene - Food Delivery Website
projects.description: Creation of a food delivery website, mobile-first with user experience design and implementation. Worked as a team leader of 4 persons (developer, integrator and web designers). Use of AGILE methods (scrum), Development done under Symfony framework. This project was realized as a final exam for my Bachelor in Web development & design graduation at EFFICOM Lille.

projects.name: Lola by Sonora Labs: Strategy Project
projects.description: The project was done as a course work in IAE Aix-Marseille Graduate School of Management and the results were delivered to Sonora Labs. Strategic market analysis for a French start-up company providing a blockchain-based private cloud solution.

projects.name: BGO Mobility - Rickshaws Mobility App
projects.description: Worked on Bgo Mobility project. An early stage start-up aiming to improve the urban mobility on how we travel in rickshaws in the cities of India. The project focus to create and deliver a whole new experience on how we commute from different parts of the city.

projects.name: YPSat - Young Professionals Satellite
projects.description: ESA's Young Professionals Satellite project, participating in the Ariane 6 maiden flight. Led communications coordination for a multidisciplinary, multicultural team.

projects.name: AI/ML Platform at ESA
projects.description: End-to-end AI/ML platform providing data management, model training, monitoring, and serving capabilities for the European Space Agency.

projects.name: OUispeak Solutions
projects.description: International communication services platform serving luxury brands including Cartier, Longchamp, Rolex, and Galeries Lafayette.

awards: 1st Winner - IBM x Intrum Hackathon for financial wellbeing (2024)
